about_the_game:
Engage in Intense Tactical Shootouts Against Terrorists! Inspired by the Vietmam's Mobile Police Force called CSCĐ (Counter. Secure. Control. Division), experience the adrenaline-fueled action as you lead your elite squad through high-stakes missions in this immersive tactical shooter.

Let's explore what the game can provide!

1. VIETNAMESE ENVIRONMENT




Our maps are crafted to reflect the contemporary Vietnamese environment, featuring narrow streets, adjacent tube houses, and intricate alley systems. Immerse yourself in an environment that influences tactical deployment, presenting a fresh and distinctive battlefield challenge. Embrace the unique architectural landscape of Vietnam and test your skills in this captivating new setting!

2. INTERESTING GUNPLAY




Discover a vast arsenal at your disposal, tailored to complement your chosen fighting style in any situation you encounter. Require pinpoint accuracy? Employ real-life aiming techniques to achieve your objective with precision!

3. CHALLENGING AI SYSTEM




Encounter a highly organized and versatile fighting force, as our AI system possesses the capability to track targets, coordinate with teammates, interact with the surrounding environment, choose optimal movement paths, and execute flanking maneuvers. Our objective was to equip the AI with numerous advanced combat abilities, providing players with a formidable opponent.

4. EFFECTIVE SUPPORT GADGETS


CSCĐ officers are outfitted with state-of-the-art gadgets that grant them advantages when facing reckless hostile forces, thereby minimizing unnecessary casualties.

5. OPERATORS MANAGEMENT




In each mission, you will have at your disposal, under your command, a total of 15 officers, divided into 3 squads of 5 each. Through their regular involvement in missions, your officers will gradually enhance and polish their skills. The player's profile will document the unit's accomplishments. During missions, the utmost caution is necessary, as the loss of a seasoned soldier is a significant impact for the team.

6. MODDING




The game offers valuable tools to support modding, with weapon customization, character modification, and the creation of custom maps.

content_descriptors.notes: Include violent shooting scenes, hostages, dead body, blood. No exploded or dismemberment body parts.
